completed_features.description: Created @cim-expert and @domain-expert agents for CIM guidance
Created CLAUDE.md, domain creation guides, and mathematical foundations docs
Added Mermaid diagrams showing DEV channel, JetStream architecture, and event flows
Updated schemas to be compatible with cim-graph library event format
Created custom commands (/cim, /domain, /architecture) for easy expert access
Added .claude/init.md for claude init customization when using as template
Corrected cim-events to cim-domain, cim-domain-workflow to cim-graph throughout project
Created automated JetStream container/VM provisioning for DEV channel
Clarified CIM-Start as DEV channel providing more events than git commits
Created @network-expert agent to invoke cim-network MCP for topology after NATS launch
Added MCP server management to flake.nix with conditional enabling and process detection for 4 MCP servers
Created @nats-expert agent specializing in Message Bus, IPLD Object Store, KV Store, and NSC security
Created @nix-expert agent specializing in cim-domain-nix for context graph projection and declarative system configuration
Created @ddd-expert agent specializing in domain boundary definition, aggregate design with state machines, and CIM DDD principles
Created @event-storming-expert agent for collaborative domain discovery sessions that generate structured results for DDD analysis
Created SAGE master agent that coordinates all 7 expert agents and serves as single entry point for CIM development

current_focus.description: Completed comprehensive agent system with SAGE as master orchestrator coordinating all CIM development workflows
priority_tasks: Test SAGE orchestration capabilities with complex CIM requests
Ensure seamless user experience through SAGE interface

next_milestones.description: Comprehensive testing of SAGE orchestration with real-world CIM development scenarios
Validate complex workflows: Event Storming → DDD Analysis → Infrastructure → Domain Creation
Complete agent-driven CIM development platform ready for production use

architecture_decisions.rationale: Provides fine-grained event capture beyond git commit granularity
Uses established library for event-driven graph construction

architecture_decisions.decision: Claude Code Agents for Domain Expertise
architecture_decisions.rationale: Provides interactive guidance for complex domain creation process
Users create projects from CIM-Start template, customize with claude init
Single entry point with master orchestrator coordinating 7 specialist agents for optimal user experience

architecture_decisions.decision: Agent-Based Domain Discovery with Event Storming
architecture_decisions.rationale: Collaborative domain discovery through structured Event Storming sessions coordinated by specialist agents

technical_debt.description: Need to verify SAGE can successfully orchestrate complex workflows with multiple agents

technical_debt.item: Event Storming agent collaborative session validation
technical_debt.description: Validate that Event Storming expert can facilitate multi-participant sessions effectively

technical_debt.item: Agent handoff and knowledge transfer mechanisms
technical_debt.description: Ensure proper information flow between agents in SAGE-orchestrated workflows
